channel.title: Need help with 317 "Delta" GlobalDrops.cfg
channel.description:
Apparently my base is Delta, but yet I cannot spawn any items that it says but anyways. //-----ItemID---CoordX--CoordY--Amount--Height--Type Is the example, and I want to learn how to make them work, so far no items appear on the ground. drop = 983 3131 9862 1 0 1 Edgeville Sewers Brass Key Is the one I've been mainly trying to get to work, and yes I'm using tabs with NotePad++ The brass key is coded in the game so it isn't that error, it has to be with the global drops I believe.
Anyone? I've spent a week trying to figure it out and I'm really getting annoyed.

item.title: Need help with 317 "Delta" GlobalDrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

program global drops yourself, it honestly isn’t that hard if you need help on where to start pm any other members or myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 317 "Delta" GlobalDrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Hahaz Hahaz
item.description:
@Hahaz wrote:

Apparently my base is Delta, but yet I cannot spawn any items that it says but anyways.
//-----ItemID—CoordX–CoordY–Amount–Height–Type
Is the example, and I want to learn how to make them work, so far no items appear on the ground.
drop = 983 3131 9862 1 0 1 Edgeville Sewers Brass Key
Is the one I’ve been mainly trying to get to work, and yes I’m using tabs with NotePad++
The brass key is coded in the game so it isn’t that error, it has to be with the global drops I believe.

Anyone? I’ve spent a week trying to figure it out and I’m really getting annoyed.

Read full topic
